data.title: ONGAKUKAN Co.,Ltd.
data.meta_description: ONGAKUKAN was founded in 1985 as a company in the music business. Below is the history of our company, including the expansion of our railway business division with the development of train simulators and automated platform doors, through to the present.
data.text: ONGAKUKAN was founded in 1985 as a company in the music business. Below is the history of our company, including the expansion of our railway business division with the development of train simulators and automated platform doors, through to the present.
